channel.title: Client help
channel.description:
Could i please have some help regarding clients.
I would like to make a client for my source and i have no idea how. Could anybody share some knowledge.
Also i would like help on getting my server online...i have tried everything from port forwarding, do i need to edit anything in client.java or server.java for it to run or not?
